page.title: 19A DAY IN THE LIFE OF...
page.content: My name is Charlotte Hardy and I am 7 years old. I live with my mother, father and younger brother at Charing. I get up at 7 o'clock and my day starts with me feeding my dog. School starts at 9 o'clock and the first playtime is at 10.35 until 10.55. I like to play skipping with my friends then. Lunch time is 12 o'clock until 1.15 and I take sandwiches to school instead of having school dinner. My favourite sandwiches are Marmite. The afternoon at school is usually art or games or topic work. We have another playtime for 15 mins. and hometime is at 3.30. When I get home I like to watch television, my favourite programmes are Batfink and Supergran. Daddy comes home about 5 o'clock and we have dinner. After dinner I have a bath and then read a story before bed.
